com.guidewire.ab.external.entity

Interface BusinessWeek

  • All Superinterfaces:
    gw.pl.external.entity.Entity, gw.pl.external.entity.KeyableEntity, Versionable
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface BusinessWeek
extends Versionable, gw.pl.external.entity.Entity
    List of businessweeks.

    • Method Detail

      • isAppliesToAllZones

        java.lang.Boolean isAppliesToAllZones()
        Deprecated. 
        True if this businessweek applies to all zones (in which case BusinessWeekZones should be empty). If false and BusinessWeekZones has elements, this businessweek applies to those zones. If false and BusinessWeekZones is empty, this businessweek doesn't apply anywhere.

      • setAppliesToAllZones

        void setAppliesToAllZones(java.lang.Boolean value)
        Deprecated. 
        True if this businessweek applies to all zones (in which case BusinessWeekZones should be empty). If false and BusinessWeekZones has elements, this businessweek applies to those zones. If false and BusinessWeekZones is empty, this businessweek doesn't apply anywhere.

      • getZoneList

        Deprecated.

      • containsZone

        boolean containsZone(Country country,
                   ZoneType zoneType,
                   java.lang.String zone)
        Deprecated. 
        If this region contains a zone of the given type and value? The string matching is case-insensitive NOTE: this will not match if a zip+4 value is provided. You must strip off the +4 before passing to this method.
        Parameters:
        country -
        zoneType - the zone type, must not be null
        zone - the zone string, must not be null
        Returns:
        true if the region containsZone a zone of the given type, false otherwise

      • getBusinessWeekZones

        BusinessWeekZone[] getBusinessWeekZones(ZoneType zt)
        Deprecated. 
        This wraps the getBusinessWeekZonesQuery(ZoneType) method, converting the result to an array of BusinessWeekZone objects.
        Parameters:
        zt - the zone type
        Returns:
        region zones of the specified type.

      • getBusinessWeekZonesQuery

        IQueryBeanResult getBusinessWeekZonesQuery(ZoneType zt)
        Deprecated. 
        This returns the set of BusinessWeekZones of the specified type.
        Parameters:
        zt - the zonetype to filter the BusinessWeekZone objects by.
        Returns:
        a queryprocessor of BusinessWeekZone

        Deprecated. Please use the version that takes an entity instead.

        elementID -

      • setZones_Method

        void setZones_Method(java.lang.String zones)
        Deprecated. use #setZoneCodes BusinessWeeks are heterogeneous therefore this method should not be used.
        Set the zones (comma-delimited list) for the region.
        Parameters:
        zones - comman separated list of zones

      • validateOnlyOneBusinessWeekAppliesToAll

        java.lang.String validateOnlyOneBusinessWeekAppliesToAll()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        an error message String if this BusinessWeek's AppliesToAllZones is set to true, and there are other BusinessWeek's that have AppliesToAllZones set to true
